languages.text: "Быть может, дело не в намеках, а в привычках, свойственных испорченной и продажной душе, сующей взятки направо и налево? И тем самым разбазаривающей казну династии? Интересно, Данрок, сколько богатств фон Валанциусов ты растратил, раздавая взятки тем, кто их не просил?"

"Perhaps this isn't about hints but the habits of a rotten, venal soul accustomed to doling out bribes left and right and thereby draining the dynasty's treasury? I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, дело не в намеках, а в привычках, свойственных испорченной и продажной душе, сующей взятки направо и налево? И тем самым разбазаривающей казну династии? Интересно, Данрок, сколько богатств фон Валанциусов ты растратил, раздавая взятки тем, кто их не просил?"

I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."

I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps this isn't about hints but the habits of a rotten, venal soul accustomed to doling out bribes left and right and thereby draining the dynasty's treasury? I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “或许这个问题与暗示无关，或许是因为某个阴暗、腐朽的灵魂本性就是这么卑劣。这个人早已习惯了到处行贿，把王朝的国库败坏个精光，对不对？丹罗克，你总是去贿赂那些并没有索取贿赂的人。我倒是想知道，你把冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的财产挥霍掉了多少？”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this isn't about hints but the habits of a rotten, venal soul accustomed to doling out bribes left and right and thereby draining the dynasty's treasury? I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."

traits.locale_text: “或许这个问题与暗示无关，或许是因为某个阴暗、腐朽的灵魂本性就是这么卑劣。这个人早已习惯了到处行贿，把王朝的国库败坏个精光，对不对？丹罗克，你总是去贿赂那些并没有索取贿赂的人。我倒是想知道，你把冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的财产挥霍掉了多少？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「これは、ほのめかされたとかじゃなくて、賄賂をあちこちに配り回って、王朝の国庫を浪費サせることに慣れきった腐った悪徳な習慣の話じゃないの？賄賂を要求してきたわけでもない相手に賄賂を配って、フォン・ヴァランシウスの財産をどれだけ浪費してきたんだろうね、ダンロック？」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this isn't about hints but the habits of a rotten, venal soul accustomed to doling out bribes left and right and thereby draining the dynasty's treasury? I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."

traits.locale_text: 「これは、ほのめかされたとかじゃなくて、賄賂をあちこちに配り回って、王朝の国庫を浪費サせることに慣れきった腐った悪徳な習慣の話じゃないの？賄賂を要求してきたわけでもない相手に賄賂を配って、フォン・ヴァランシウスの財産をどれだけ浪費してきたんだろうね、ダンロック？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez no sean indirectas sino la costumbre de un alma podrida y venial acostumbrada a repartir sobornos a diestro y siniestro, vaciando alegremente las arcas de la dinastía. Danrok, siento curiosidad por saber cuánta de la fortuna von Valancius ha derrochado sobornando a gente que no lo ha pedido».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this isn't about hints but the habits of a rotten, venal soul accustomed to doling out bribes left and right and thereby draining the dynasty's treasury? I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez no sean indirectas sino la costumbre de un alma podrida y venial acostumbrada a repartir sobornos a diestro y siniestro, vaciando alegremente las arcas de la dinastía. Danrok, siento curiosidad por saber cuánta de la fortuna von Valancius ha derrochado sobornando a gente que no lo ha pedido».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ce ne sont peut-être pas des sous-entendus qui sont en cause, mais les travers d'une âme corrompue et vénale, habituée à distribuer des dessous-de-table au gré du vent et vidant du même coup les caisses de la dynastie ? Dites-moi, Danrok, par curiosité... quel pourcentage de la fortune des von Valancius avez-vous gaspillé en graissant la patte de gens qui ne demandaient rien ? »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this isn't about hints but the habits of a rotten, venal soul accustomed to doling out bribes left and right and thereby draining the dynasty's treasury? I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."

traits.locale_text: « Ce ne sont peut-être pas des sous-entendus qui sont en cause, mais les travers d'une âme corrompue et vénale, habituée à distribuer des dessous-de-table au gré du vent et vidant du même coup les caisses de la dynastie ? Dites-moi, Danrok, par curiosité... quel pourcentage de la fortune des von Valancius avez-vous gaspillé en graissant la patte de gens qui ne demandaient rien ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht geht es hier gar nicht um irgendwelche Andeutungen, sondern hier spricht jemand, dessen verkommene, käufliche Seele es gewohnt ist, Schmiergelder zu verteilen und so die Schatzkammer der Dynastie zu belasten? Ich würde wirklich gerne wissen, Danrok, wie viel des von Valancius-Vermögens Ihr vergeudet habt, indem Ihr Bestechungsgelder an Leute rausgegeben habt, die gar nicht darum gebeten hatten."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this isn't about hints but the habits of a rotten, venal soul accustomed to doling out bribes left and right and thereby draining the dynasty's treasury? I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht geht es hier gar nicht um irgendwelche Andeutungen, sondern hier spricht jemand, dessen verkommene, käufliche Seele es gewohnt ist, Schmiergelder zu verteilen und so die Schatzkammer der Dynastie zu belasten? Ich würde wirklich gerne wissen, Danrok, wie viel des von Valancius-Vermögens Ihr vergeudet habt, indem Ihr Bestechungsgelder an Leute rausgegeben habt, die gar nicht darum gebeten hatten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Belki burada mesele imalar değildir de sağda solda rüşvet dağıtan ve hanedanlığın hazinesini çarçur eden, çürümüş bir şahsın alışkanlıklarıdır? Merak ettim Danrok... Von Valancius varlıklarının ne kadarını, onları istemeyen kişilere rüşvet olarak dağıtarak boşa harcadın?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps this isn't about hints but the habits of a rotten, venal soul accustomed to doling out bribes left and right and thereby draining the dynasty's treasury? I'd be curious to know, Danrok, how much of the von Valancius fortune you have squandered by handing out bribes to people who did not ask for them."

traits.locale_text: "Belki burada mesele imalar değildir de, sağda solda rüşvet dağıtan ve hanedanlığın hazinesini çarçur eden, çürümüş bir şahsın alışkanlıklarıdır? Merak ettim Danrok, von Valancius'un varlıklarının ne kadarını, onları istemeyen kişilere rüşvet olarak dağıtarak boşa harcadın?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
